    Leqian Zheng

    City University of Hong Kong

    • Working in privacy protection, with some interests in theoretical computer science, and passionate about hiking.
    • Hong Kong, China
    • Email
    • DBLP
    • Github
    • Google Scholar
    • ORCID

    I am currently working toward the Ph.D. degree at City University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. WANG Cong. My research interest includes information security and applied cryptography with recent focus on encrypted search and oblivious algorithms. I have published papers with total on top venues including USENIX Security, VLDB, ACM CCS, IEEE TDSC, and SDM.
